评论概述: Color Fades but very good quality
评论详情: I bought these to use as part of my security guard uniform where I need black dress/y pants.  These pants have a lot going for them.  There is a tiny bit of stretch, they have wide, tough belt loops and the material is very sturdy.  But after several washes they are fading and I really can't use them any longer at work.  I work part time so they aren't getting washed but maybe once ever couple of weeks or so.  They are great pants but just don't expect them to stay pitch black for too long.  Otherwise I'd give them five stars.

评论概述: Technician work pants. Not outdoor work pants

The pockets are quite deep at least. Overall a good value for the money. Just don’t expect them to be great for outdoor work.
